mapper.insert: insert into boardN(bno, title, content, writer, regdate, visited) values (nseq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update boardN set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where bno=#{bno}
update boardN set visited=visited+1 where bno=#{bno}
